meanings.definition: The act of a spacecraft landing in water.
meanings.sent1: The splashdowns of the spaceship were a thrilling sight for the spectators.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts safely experienced the splashdowns of their capsule in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The aliens found the splashdowns of the human spacecraft quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The splashdowns of the spaceship were like giant water balloons popping in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The splashdowns of the spacecraft marked the end of their space journey.

meanings.definition: The sound or action of something splashing into water.
meanings.sent1: The children giggled at the splashdowns of the stones they threw into the pond.
meanings.sent2: The splashdowns of the diving pelican were a graceful display of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent3: The playful otter enjoyed the splashdowns it created while diving into the river.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops made gentle splashdowns on the surface of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The splashdowns of the fish leaping out of the water were mesmerizing to watch.
